functions.name: known_term_ratio
functions.description: Calculate the ratio of extracted terms found in vocabulary

functions.name: coverage_score
functions.description: Calculate the percentage of text covered by extracted terms (character-based)

functions.name: entity_density
functions.description: Calculate entity density as terms per 100 tokens

functions.name: section_type_mismatch
functions.signature: section_type_mismatch(terms: list[str], section_type: str | None) -> float
functions.description: Calculate section type mismatch penalty (stub for SO data)
